participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Alex is typically optimistic but can feel overwhelmed at times, leading to moments of vulnerability.
participant_1.background: She works in marketing and enjoys creative activities like painting and writing in her spare time.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Jordan is generally cheerful and sociable, always ready to lend an ear to friends in need.
participant_2.background: He is a software engineer who loves hiking and exploring new technologies.
